title: Nazar Andaaz
writer: Vikrant Deshmukh, Sameer Halim, Laxman Utekar
short_cast: Kumud Mishra, Divya Dutta, Abhishek Banerjee, Rajeshwari Sachdev
cast: Kumud Mishra, Divya Dutta, Abhishek Banerjee, Rajeshwari Sachdev
genre: Hindi-Language Movies, Bollywood Movies, Comedies, Dramas

desc: A carefree blind man living with his loyal caretaker inadvertently launches a chaotic competition for his wealth when he befriends a small-time thief.
